name: Find the ingredients!
description:
Submit to Potato Game Jam 2021!

In this game you are a potato!

As Hero of the Village of Potato, you need to recover the sacred ingredients!

Find out where they are, to complete the game!

Team:

Rodrigo Pereira (Programer, Level Design)

Virgínia Cardoso (Artist, Game Design, SFX)

Art/Program: Belong to us, the creators of the game.

SFX/Music: Thanks to these amazing artists:

* Grasslands Theme: CodeManu

* Menu Theme: mrpoly

* Level Win: tuudurt 

* Lose: cabled-mess

* Colect item: sharesynth__jump00
